name: Dice Worlds
description:
Summary

You are a dicey traveler between the dice worlds. But where does your path lead you? In every dice world there is something to find that will lead you further. It is always worth talking to the inhabitants of the dice worlds. Maybe they have useful tips.

Controls on keyboard:

WASD - Movement

Left mouse - Camera

E- Interaction

ESC - Quit

M - Back to Main Menu

Credits:

zeichn, Milmalissa - Digital Art

manio, Ben, Rune - Music & Sound Producer

ThePeat, Paul Sohns, Robin Starkgraff, Alina de Vries, Clemens Hübner, Alexandra Tetzlaff, Anna Zitzer - Programming
